globalFlags.name: --configLoader <loader>
globalFlags.description: Use 'bundle' to bundle the config with Rolldown, or 'runner' (experimental) to process it on the fly, or 'native' (experimental) to load using the native runtime (default: bundle)

viteDevFlags.name: --strictPort
viteDevFlags.description: Exit if specified port is already in use

viteDevFlags.name: --force
viteDevFlags.description: Force the optimizer to ignore the cache and re-bundle

viteDevFlags.name: --experimentalBundle
viteDevFlags.description: Use experimental full bundle mode (this is highly experimental)

viteBuildFlags.name: --assetsDir <dir>
viteBuildFlags.description: Directory under outDir to place assets in (default: assets)

viteBuildFlags.name: --assetsInlineLimit <number>
viteBuildFlags.description: Static asset base64 inline threshold in bytes (default: 4096)

viteBuildFlags.name: --ssr [entry]
viteBuildFlags.description: Build specified entry for server-side rendering

viteBuildFlags.name: --sourcemap [output]
viteBuildFlags.description: Output source maps for build (default: false)

viteBuildFlags.name: --minify [minifier]
viteBuildFlags.description: Enable/disable minification, or specify minifier to use (default: esbuild)

viteBuildFlags.name: --emptyOutDir
viteBuildFlags.description: Force empty outDir when it's outside of root

viteBuildFlags.name: -w, --watch
viteBuildFlags.description: Rebuilds when modules have changed on disk

viteOptimizeFlags.name: --force
viteOptimizeFlags.description: Force the optimizer to ignore the cache and re-bundle

vitePreviewFlags.name: --strictPort
vitePreviewFlags.description: Exit if specified port is already in use
